summary.overview: This JCL compiles and deploys CICS screen map definitions for the card demo application. It processes BMS map source code through assembly and link-editing to create executable screen layouts and generates copybook structures for application development.
business_functions: Copy CICS map source code from library to temporary dataset for processing
Assemble CICS map definitions to generate executable screen layout objects
Link-edit assembled map objects to create deployable load modules
Generate data structure definitions (DSECTs) as copybooks for COBOL programs
Display assembly listing for verification and review of compilation results
Refresh CICS program definition to activate new screen maps in running environment
Clean up temporary datasets to free system storage space

BMSCMP.jcl.program_overview: IBM utility program that copies CICS map source code to temporary dataset
IBM High Level Assembler that compiles CICS map definitions and generates data structures
IBM Linkage Editor that creates executable load modules from assembled objects
IBM null program used for dataset cleanup operations
System Display and Search Facility that refreshes CICS program definitions

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo BMS Map Source Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.BMS(CICSMAP))
datasource_summary.business_name: Card Demo BMS Map Source Library
datasource_summary.function: Contains BMS map definition source code that defines screen layouts and field attributes for CICS applications

datasource_summary.name: Temporary BMS Map Work File (&&TEMPM)
datasource_summary.function: Temporary storage for BMS map source during compilation process

datasource_summary.name: CICS System Macro Library (OEM.CICSTS.V05R06M0.CICS.SDFHMAC)
datasource_summary.function: System library containing CICS macro definitions required for BMS map assembly

datasource_summary.name: System Macro Library (SYS1.MACLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Standard system macro library containing macros needed for assembly operations

datasource_summary.name: Language Environment Macro Library (CEE.SCEEMAC)
datasource_summary.function: Contains Language Environment macros required for assembly process

datasource_summary.name: Temporary Map Object Work File (&&MAP)
datasource_summary.function: Temporary storage for assembled object code during link-edit process

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Load Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LOADLIB(CICSMAP))
datasource_summary.function: Final executable load library where compiled BMS maps are stored for CICS runtime use

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Listing Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LST(CICSMAP))
datasource_summary.function: Contains assembly listings and compilation details for review and documentation purposes

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Copybook Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.CPY(CICSMAP))
datasource_summary.function: Contains generated DSECT copybooks that define data structures for BMS maps, used by COBOL programs

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IEBGENER["IBM utility program that copies CICS map source code to temporary dataset (IEBGENER) "]
    ASMA90["IBM High Level Assembler that compiles CICS map definitions and generates data structures (ASMA90) "]
    HEWL["IBM Linkage Editor that creates executable load modules from assembled objects (HEWL) "]
    IEFBR14["IBM null program used for dataset cleanup operations (IEFBR14) "]
    SDSF["System Display and Search Facility that refreshes CICS program definitions (SDSF) "]
